comments.body: Lot 1: 0.018Finally see one of the gold bars up again. It's been a while that Frank released a new coin (besides the scam specials).Still hoping to see a solid silver bar from him.

comments.body: I thought I had my bids mixed up and I didn’t , all is correct. Lol. Looks like I won both auctions , will wait to miner Jones confirms .  Ty lolPro tip:   Don’t try and bid and drive at the same time. Lol. (Don’t worry I was on an empty road with no cars )
